Ryazani news

More than 1,500 razors participated in the Crechen bathing in the Lake.

19.01.2024 12:42
The water in Jordan devoted the Mitropolitan of Ryazan and Mihaylovsky Mark.

In the Ryazan and Moscow regions, the suburban train schedule will change

19.01.2024 12:03
The schedule will change from 22 January due to the upgrading of the road infrastructure on three sections.

Roads continue to work on weather management in 3 CFC regions

19.01.2024 11:15
All directions are now in the state system.

In 14 hours in Ryazani, 18 mm rainfall at a monthly rate of 38

19.01.2024 10:38
The synoptics predict that wet snow, rain, wet snow, wet snow, hollow.

During the night of Ryazani Street, 4,372 cubic metres of snow were removed

19.01.2024 10:18
14 tons of reagent and 166 cubic metres of sand and salt were used.

The Novosel buses in Ryazani were filmed

19.01.2024 10:15
Public transport can't go up to the mountain because of the holoid.

Consequences of the fall in Ryazani. What happens in the city on 19 January

19.01.2024 10
People are actively sharing social media observations. This includes public cleaning services.

Ryazans can quickly send clean-up applications to urban chat.

19.01.2024 09:57
At the direction of Vitalia Artemiova, town chat shops have been set up on the cleaning of the city.

In Kasimov, an operational headquarters was set up to deal with the effects of the snow

19.01.2024 09:49
The Chief of the City Administration, Ivan Bahilov, reported this to Wontact.

Novosov got buses in Ryazani.

19.01.2024 09:26
According to the witness, the movement is paralyzed, the road is blocked.

In 2023, Rostelek installed 20 base stations in Ryazan province

19.01.2024 09:23
Rostelcom has implemented the annual work plan of the second phase of the federal project on the elimination of digital inequalities (CS 2.0) in Ryazan province.

In court, the details of the arrest of a Kasimov, who attempted to kill a friend, were given.

19.01.2024 08:57
Kasimov District Court sent Kasimov, a resident suspected of attempted murder, to the SIZO

A bright outbreak was observed over Daskovo Spring in Ryazani.

19.01.2024 08:36
The phenomenon was not accompanied by a loud sound.

21 billion roubles valued the damage from explosions in military warehouses

19.01.2024 07:40
This is the amount of the RF Minor asked for an ex-comander of the military part of Alexei Kozievnikov.

Ryazani has a high-readiness regime

19.01.2024 07:38
A special regime has been introduced since 18 January to prevent the disruption of life due to difficult weather conditions.

Head expected in Ryazan province

18.01.2024 23:54
The Russian Ministry of Foreign Affairs recommends that the inhabitants of the region comply with security measures

Kirienko gave the Ryazan region a special award at the Russian exhibition.

18.01.2024 22:47
The First Deputy Chief of Administration of the President of the Russian Federation, Sergei Kirienko, awarded the Ryazan Region a special award of the organization in the name of the New Year Russia.

South District Ryazani burnt the fura

18.01.2024 22:40
According to the press service of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia in Ryazan province, the fire on the 197 kilometres of the M-5 route was reported at 16.15 on 18 January.

The Ryazan priest complained about a nasty villain in the priest's claw.

18.01.2024 19:35
According to the priest, for a few days, the unpleasant smell felt in Dashkovo-Pesocene, now it feels in the center of Ryazani.

Stereoscopes with historical species appeared on the streets of Kasimova

18.01.2024 18:47
It's like street binoculars in the past, in which specially processed historical photographs are taken in.

Ryazani schools were screened by the force following reports of threats of attacks

18.01.2024 18:41
Schools received faecal calls with threats. School managers have been instructed to call the police.

In Ryazani, 10-ball samples were recorded

18.01.2024 18:31
Today, the weather has deteriorated sharply in Ryazani. It's snowing, the wind is rising. Visibility on the roads is bad. As a result, accidents occur around the city.

The unknown broke the door in the razor K.

18.01.2024 18:08
A surveillance camera was taken off by an Internacional Street in Kanivo.

A man's body was found in the Miloslava district

18.01.2024 17:52
The body of a 63-year-old man without signs of violent death was found on 18 January by the villagers of Shiškino.

Pavel Malkov: Every human being deserves comfort.

18.01.2024 17:46
In 2024, 18 public territories will benefit the Ryazan region.

Coward showed photos in the bathing suit.

18.01.2024 16:56
Alexandra is on vacation in Dubai. She'll be on the beach in the pictures, and one more photo is on the hang.

In the middle of Ryazani, there was an accident.

18.01.2024 16:05
At the entrance to the beam on the Pervomay Prospect, two light vehicles were encountered at a former communications school.

The 5th base in Ryazani identified 7 Russian citizens who were not in military custody.

18.01.2024 4:00
The citizens were given the summons to appear in the military.

In Dashkovo-Pesochny, the route

18.01.2024 15:55
On the day of 18 January, a bus on the 27th route to Ryazani was stunned.

Ryazanski Mintrans contacted drivers

18.01.2024 15:50
Synoptics predict that between 18 and 19 January, heavy snow is expected in the Ryazan region and visibility is reduced to 500 m
